alert.note: Alert for Catawba; Greater Burke; Lincoln (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:37PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Catawba, northwestern Lincoln and southeastern Burke Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Hickory, or near Mountain View, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newton, Hickory, Longview, Maiden, Icard, Hildebran, Hickory Regional Airport, Mountain View, Rutherford College and Connelly Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
